org.anchoranalysis.feature.io.results

Class ResultsWriter

  • Object
    • ResultsWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ResultsWriter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Feature calculation results that can be outputted in different ways.

    The outputs are (based upon the default output-names in ResultsWriterOutputNames): 

     Two CSV files outputted:
    features.csv:              all the features in a single CSV file
    featuresAggregated.csv:    aggregate-functions applied to each group of features (based upon their group identifier)

 Additionally, the following files might be outputted for each group
    featuresGroup.csv:            the features for a particular-group
    featuresAggregatedGroup.xml   the aggregate-functions applied to this particular-group (in an XML format)
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

      • ResultsWriter

        public ResultsWriter(ResultsWriterMetadata outputMetadata,
                     InputOutputContext context)
              throws OutputWriteFailedException
        Creates for metadata and in a particular directory.
        Parameters:
        outputMetadata - metadata needed for determing output-names and CSV headers.
        context - defines the direction in which outputs occur.
        Throws:
        OutputWriteFailedException - if writing fails

    • Method Detail

      • addResultsFor

        public void addResultsFor(RowLabels labels,
                          ResultsVector results)
        Adds feature-calculation results to be written.

        Depending on the output type, these results are either immediately written or else stored in memory to be written later (collectively after all results have been added).

        Parameters:
        labels - labels that identify the results.
        results - the results.

      • writeResultsForAllGroups

        public void writeResultsForAllGroups(Optional<NamedFeatureStore<FeatureInputResults>> featuresAggregate,
                                     boolean includeGroups,
                                     InputOutputContext context)
                              throws OutputWriteFailedException
        Writes the stored-results to CSV files.
        Parameters:
        featuresAggregate - aggregate-features
        includeGroups - iff true a group-column is included in the CSV file and the group exports occur, otherwise not
        context - input-output context
        Throws:
        OutputWriteFailedException - if writing fails
